cryptids.name: Jersey Devil
cryptids.description: A creature said to inhabit the Pine Barrens of New Jersey, described as a flying biped with hooves.

cryptids.name: Yeti
cryptids.description: Also known as the 'Abominable Snowman,' this ape-like creature is said to inhabit the Himalayan mountains.

cryptids.name: Bogeyman
cryptids.description: A mythical creature used by various cultures to frighten children into good behavior.

cryptids.name: Kraken
cryptids.description: A legendary sea monster said to dwell off the coasts of Norway and Greenland, known for dragging ships underwater.

cryptids.name: Mokele-Mbembe
cryptids.description: A dinosaur-like creature said to inhabit the Congo River Basin, often described as a large sauropod.

cryptids.name: Chupacabra
cryptids.description: A legendary creature in Latin American folklore said to attack livestock, particularly goats, and drink their blood.
